children.text: At a recent pitstop out west, I discovered the '
', made by a team that makes "artful restrooms for people who care."
A purple cow if there were ever such a thing, and a great reminder too.
You don't have to be everything or serve everyone to get talked about.
You just have to find some (small) way to be remark-able. Often, that simply means caring more than your competition, in service of the few people who are changed by it.
That's how you get picture-worthy portapotties, and just about anything else worth talking about.
